subject: United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: It is fair to say that Althea Gibson would recognize as her spiritual heirs not only Serena and Venus Williams, but also Open finalists Justine Henin and Svetlana Kuznetsova.
snippet: It is fair to say that Althea Gibson would recognize as her spiritual heirs not only Serena and Venus Williams, but also Open finalists Justine Henin and Svetlana Kuznetsova.
